title: Ep290 CIA Crimes
description:
This week, the gals go incognito with Patrick Hinds of True Crime Obsessed to talk about some top-secret scenarios. Topics include cyborg kitties, a rough history of the disaster in Afghanistan, and some wildly inappropriate LSD experiments. Sneak a glass of Winc's Far + Wide Zweigelt, do not leave your drink unattended, and tune in for CIA Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
